Sure, here's a table of items that can be selected by rolling 2d10 in "Chronicles of Everia", along with the skill and attributes needed to use them, their effect, and the damage bonus they provide:

| Roll (2d10) | Item | Skill Needed | Attribute Needed | Effect | Damage Bonus |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 2 | Wand of Fireball | Arcana | Intelligence | Creates a large explosion of fire | +2d6 |
| 3 | Healing Potion | Medicine | Wisdom | Restores a moderate amount of health | - |
| 4 | Smoke Bomb | Stealth | Dexterity | Creates a cloud of smoke, allowing for escape or distraction | - |
| 5 | Poisoned Dagger | Sleight of Hand | Dexterity | Deals damage over time and has a chance to poison | +1d4 |
| 6 | Shield of Light | Religion | Wisdom | Creates a protective barrier that absorbs damage | - |
| 7 | Holy Water | Religion | Wisdom | Deals bonus damage to undead and demonic creatures | +1d6 |
| 8 | Potion of Invisibility | Stealth | Dexterity | Renders the user invisible for a short time | - |
| 9 | Ring of Telekinesis | Arcana | Intelligence | Allows the user to move objects with their mind | - |
| 10 | Bow of Ice | Nature | Dexterity | Creates a bolt of ice that deals cold damage | +1d8 |
| 11 | Staff of Lightning | Arcana | Intelligence | Creates a bolt of lightning that strikes multiple targets | +1d6 |
| 12 | Sword of Darkness | Intimidation | Strength | Deals bonus damage to holy or good-aligned creatures | +2d6 |
| 13 | Tome of Knowledge | Investigation | Intelligence | Grants knowledge on a specific topic or skill | - |
| 14 | Amulet of Protection | Endurance | Constitution | Grants resistance to a specific type of damage | - |
| 15 | Gauntlets of Strength | Athletics | Strength | Increases the user's strength for a short time | - |
| 16 | Boots of Speed | Athletics | Dexterity | Increases the user's speed for a short time | - |
| 17 | Cloak of Invisibility | Stealth | Dexterity | Renders the user invisible for a longer period of time | - |
| 18 | Ring of Regeneration | Medicine | Constitution | Restores health over time | - |

Note: The damage bonus listed is added to the damage dealt by the weapon or spell used to attack with the item. The damage may be modified by other factors, such as the target's armor, the attacker's strength or dexterity, or other bonuses and penalties. To use an item, the character must have the necessary skill and attribute. For example, to use the Wand of Fireball, the character must have proficiency in the Arcana skill and a high Intelligence score.
